html: Like so many of my colleagues, I will miss having Paul Ryan in Congress. I wish Paul, Janna, and their family nothing but the best.
text: Like so many of my colleagues, I will miss having Paul Ryan in Congress. I wish Paul, Janna, and their family nothing but the best.

html: His intellectual and political leadership was indispensable in passing our historic tax reform. He has worked faithfully to make this a better nation for all.
text: His intellectual and political leadership was indispensable in passing our historic tax reform. He has worked faithfully to make this a better nation for all.

html: It has been an honor to work with Paul in Congress. He stepped into the speakership during a difficult moment, providing the personal and political guidance that enabled the House of Representatives to succeed.
text: It has been an honor to work with Paul in Congress. He stepped into the speakership during a difficult moment, providing the personal and political guidance that enabled the House of Representatives to succeed.

html: I have known Paul Ryan since we were elected together to the House in 1998. In addition to serving on the House Budget and Banking committees together, I consider Paul a good friend and speak with certainty in saying he is a terrific public servant, husband, and father.
